My Projects

Earthly: A Movement Towards Sustainability

    Made with:

Driven by a passion for a healthier planet and a brighter future, Earthly focuses on sustainable and reusable products, designed and developed to empower individuals and communities towards mindful living. Minimizing environmental impact is at the heart of our efforts, achieved through eco-friendly materials and responsible production practices.

Live Code

Journal App

    Made with:

This project is more than just a journaling app; it's a sanctuary for self-exploration and growth, meticulously crafted with Java Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, and SAQL. Whether you're a seasoned writer or a journaling newbie, our intuitive interface and powerful features empower you to capture your thoughts, dreams, and aspirations with ease.

Live Code

BooksXchange

    Made with:

Booksxchange is a Java Spring Boot and Angular project that enables book enthusiasts to seamlessly buy and sell books within their community. With a robust backend, intuitive Angular frontend, and SQL for efficient data management, the platform transforms traditional book exchange into a modern, tech-driven experience, fostering a vibrant literary ecosystem.

Live Code
